A

AbstractLiquibaseMojo - Class in com.edugility.liquibase.maven
An AbstractMojo housing Liquibase functionality.
AbstractLiquibaseMojo() - Constructor for class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AbstractLiquibaseMojo
Creates a new AbstractLiquibaseMojo.
append(CharSequence) - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.TemplateOutputWriter
Appends the supplied CharSequence to the Writer supplied at construction time and returns this TemplateOutputWriter.
append(char[]) - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.TemplateOutputWriter
Writes the supplied char array to the Writer supplied at construction time and returns this TemplateOutputWriter.
assembleChangeLog() - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AssembleChangeLogMojo
Assembles a Liquibase changelog from changelog fragments found in topological dependency order among the dependencies of the current project.
AssembleChangeLogMojo - Class in com.edugility.liquibase.maven
Scans the test classpath in dependency order for Liquibase changelog fragments and assembles a master changelog that includes them all in dependency order.
AssembleChangeLogMojo() - Constructor for class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AssembleChangeLogMojo
Creates a new AssembleChangeLogMojo.

C

com.edugility.liquibase.maven - package com.edugility.liquibase.maven
 

E

execute() - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AssembleChangeLogMojo
Executes this AssembleChangeLogMojo by calling the AssembleChangeLogMojo.assembleChangeLog() method.
execute() - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.HelpMojo

G

getArtifactFilter() - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AssembleChangeLogMojo
Returns an ArtifactFilter that may be used to filter the Artifacts whose associated Files are inspected for changelog fragments.
getArtifactResolver() - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AssembleChangeLogMojo
Returns the ArtifactResolver that will be used internally to resolve Artifacts representing the current project's dependencies.
getChangeLogCharacterEncoding() - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AssembleChangeLogMojo
Returns the character encoding used to write the assembled changelog.
getChangeLogParameters() - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AssembleChangeLogMojo
Returns a Properties object containing changelog parameters.
getChangeLogResourceNames() - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AssembleChangeLogMojo
Returns a List of Strings, each element of which is a name of a classpath resource that might identify an actual changelog fragment.
getChangeLogResources() - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AssembleChangeLogMojo
Examines the current MavenProject's dependencies, resolving them if necessary, and assembles and returns a Collection whose elements are URLs representing reachable changelog fragments that are classpath resources.
getChangeLogResources(Iterable<? extends Artifact>) - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AssembleChangeLogMojo
Given an Iterable of Artifacts, and given a non-null, non-empty return value from the AssembleChangeLogMojo.getChangeLogResourceNames() method, this method returns a Collection of URLs representing changelog resources found among the supplied Artifacts.
getChangeLogTemplateResource() - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AssembleChangeLogMojo
Using an appropriate ClassLoader, returns a URL that may be used to get the changelog template associated with this AssembleChangeLogMojo.
getChangeLogTemplateResourceName() - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AssembleChangeLogMojo
Returns the classpath resource name of an MVEL template that will aggregate changelog fragments together.
getDatabaseChangeLogXsdVersion() - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AssembleChangeLogMojo
Returns a String representing the version of the Liquibase dbchangelog schema to use.
getDependencyGraphBuilder() - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AssembleChangeLogMojo
Returns the DependencyGraphBuilder used by this AssembleChangeLogMojo to perform dependency resolution.
getLocalRepository() - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AssembleChangeLogMojo
Returns the ArtifactRepository that represents the current local Maven repository.
getOutputFile() - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AssembleChangeLogMojo
Validates the current File that represents the full path to the file that will result after the AssembleChangeLogMojo.execute() method runs successfully and returns it.
getProject() - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AbstractLiquibaseMojo
Returns the MavenProject affiliated with this AbstractLiquibaseMojo.
getSkip() - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AssembleChangeLogMojo
Returns true if the AssembleChangeLogMojo.execute() method should take no action.
getTemplateCharacterEncoding() - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AssembleChangeLogMojo
Returns the character encoding used to read the MVEL template used to aggregate changelog fragments together.

H

HelpMojo - Class in com.edugility.liquibase.maven
Display help information on liquibase-maven-plugin.
Call mvn liquibase:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.
HelpMojo() - Constructor for class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.HelpMojo
 

S

Sets the File that represents the full path to the file that will result after the AssembleChangeLogMojo.execute() method runs successfully.
setProject(MavenProject) - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AbstractLiquibaseMojo
Affiliates the supplied MavenProject with this AbstractLiquibaseMojo.
setSkip(boolean) - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AssembleChangeLogMojo
Sets whether the AssembleChangeLogMojo.execute() method will take any action.
setTemplateCharacterEncoding(String) - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AssembleChangeLogMojo

T

TemplateOutputWriter - Class in com.edugility.liquibase.maven
A TemplateOutputStream that delegates to a Writer.
TemplateOutputWriter(Writer) - Constructor for class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.TemplateOutputWriter
Creates a new TemplateOutputWriter.
toString() - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.TemplateOutputWriter
Returns null when invoked, following the undocumented practice and convention of the StandardOutputStream class.

W

write(String, Collection<? extends URL>, File) - Method in class com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AssembleChangeLogMojo
Writes appropriate representations of the supplied URLs as interpreted and merged into the supplied template contents to the File represented by the outputFile parameter value.
